title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 250.8 - Administrative law judge; hearing officer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 250.8 - Administrative law judge; hearing officer

State Regulations

The terms administrative law judge or hearing officer shall
mean an agent of the board so designated by the chair or their designee and
shall include the director and assistant director of private employment
practices and representation. As used in these rules, the terms administrative
law judge and hearing officer are interchangeable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
250.8

Renumbered from 250.5

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
